problem_statement: Accurate currency conversion is difficult to implement correctly due to floating-point precision errors, inconsistent exchange-rate sources, varying currency rounding rules, unreliable network conditions, and poor handling of edge cases such as missing rates, stale data, and offline usage.
PASS_TO_PASS: tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should validate currency codes correctly
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should check if currency is supported
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should return list of available currencies
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should search currencies by code or name
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should swap currencies correctly
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should provide last updated timestamp
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should detect stale data
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::should provide rate metadata
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::RateFetcher should fetch rates with proper structure
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::RateFetcher should cache rates
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::RateFetcher should respect force refresh
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::RateFetcher should clear cache
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::Rate data should have valid string rates
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should validate number strings
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should add with precision
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should subtract with precision
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should multiply with precision
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should divide with precision
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should handle large numbers without overflow
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should detect zero correctly
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should detect negative correctly
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should round with HALF_UP strategy
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should round to zero decimal places (JPY)
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should round to three decimal places (KWD)
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should throw on division by zero
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::DecimalMath should compare numbers correctly
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CrossRateEngine should calculate same currency rate as 1
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CrossRateEngine should calculate cross-rate via base currency
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CrossRateEngine should handle conversion from base currency
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CrossRateEngine should handle conversion to base currency
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CrossRateEngine should throw on missing rate
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should use correct minor units for JPY (0 decimals)
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should use correct minor units for KWD (3 decimals)
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should reject negative amounts by default
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should allow negative amounts when configured
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should provide raw unrounded value for auditing
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should support lock rate mode
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should use locked rate for conversion
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CurrencyConverter should clear locked rates
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::getMinorUnits should return correct values for different currencies
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CURRENCY_MINOR_UNITS should include zero-decimal currencies
tests/currencyConverter.test.ts::CURRENCY_MINOR_UNITS should include three-decimal currencies
tests/components.test.ts::should initialize converter successfully
tests/components.test.ts::should handle conversion errors gracefully
tests/components.test.ts::should return null for uninitialized converter operations
tests/components.test.ts::should track loading state during initialization
tests/components.test.ts::should provide last result from conversion
tests/components.test.ts::should handle rate locking in composable context
tests/components.test.ts::should search currencies correctly
tests/components.test.ts::should detect stale data based on threshold
tests/components.test.ts::should provide rate metadata
tests/components.test.ts::getCurrencySymbol should return correct symbols for major currencies
tests/components.test.ts::getCurrencySymbol should return code with space for unknown currencies
tests/components.test.ts::formatResult should combine symbol and amount correctly
tests/components.test.ts::formatResult should handle three-decimal currencies
tests/components.test.ts::formatTimestamp should return N/A for zero timestamp
tests/components.test.ts::formatTimestamp should format valid timestamps
tests/components.test.ts::formatTimestamp should handle current timestamp
tests/components.test.ts::should handle currency swap correctly
tests/components.test.ts::should handle empty amount input
tests/components.test.ts::should handle invalid amount input
tests/components.test.ts::should maintain available currencies list
tests/components.test.ts::should handle lock/unlock toggle correctly
tests/components.test.ts::should refresh rates and update timestamp
tests/components.test.ts::should throw error for negative amounts by default
tests/components.test.ts::should handle negative amounts when allowed
tests/components.test.ts::should throw error for unsupported currency
tests/components.test.ts::should throw error for invalid currency code format
tests/components.test.ts::should display error message for failed conversion
tests/components.test.ts::should format JPY without decimal places
tests/components.test.ts::should format KWD with 3 decimal places
tests/components.test.ts::should format USD with 2 decimal places
tests/components.test.ts::should provide raw unrounded value for audit display
tests/components.test.ts::should display rate in correct format
tests/components.test.ts::should display inverse rate
tests/components.test.ts::should display base currency in metadata
tests/components.test.ts::should display source in metadata
tests/components.test.ts::should display date in metadata
tests/components.test.ts::should display last updated timestamp
tests/components.test.ts::should show stale warning when data is old
tests/components.test.ts::should not show stale warning for fresh data
tests/components.test.ts::should provide list of available currencies for dropdown
tests/components.test.ts::should search currencies by code
tests/components.test.ts::should search currencies by name
tests/components.test.ts::should return empty array for no search matches
tests/components.test.ts::should validate currency code format for selection
tests/components.test.ts::should check if selected currency is supported
